settings.heading: Why Are We Different?
settings.subheading:
> We Offer Many Conditions of Hardware ... New, New Open Box, OEM Reconditioned, and Used/Reconditioned

> We Are Authorized Partners for Many Brands and Work through Distribution Channels to get the right items

> We also Work Among Worldwide Dealers who have Pockets Of Hardware we can use

> We Buy Back Your Old and Surplus (New as well) and Pay You Outright or can use it for Credit in future purchases.

We are not tied down to the "Traditional model"
